useControlText.message: Click the button below to record your answer
useControlText.description: 此翻译文件隶属于exam.js和questionNew.js 被考试试题预览页面、布置个人作业所用到，

makeSureText.message: Flash version should be at least 11.1.0

dragSortText.message: Note: Drag an item to sequence

newQParse.message: New types of Q not parsed

noFoundPathText.message: The audio path for the student was not found

markSkipText.message: Mark point: you can mark {questions} Q

noMarkText.message: You can mark this volume no problem, write some comments to the students.

checkPaperText.message: The paper you are looking for doesn’t exist, the browser will be closed!

submitAnswerText.message: Answer record can’t be submitted in teacher account!

putIllegalText.message: Input contains illegal characters and has been deleted for you

autoClearText.message: Input sensitive tags, for ensure service security, the system has been automatically cleared

inputIgnoredText.message: The input number is limited to 200 characters (including punctuation), your answer is beyond the scope of the system, the excess will be ignored

recordTip.message: Note: The recording of this question can only be played {count} times

timesOverTip.message: Note: This question has been used up

recordText.message: Recording is in process, please finish recording first!

unknowText.message: Unknown failure occurred to the server, please try again later!

processText.message: In the process of loading answer record that is interrupted last time

systemText.message: The system has helped you restore interrupted exam record in {time}!

examPaperText.message: Exam paper submission failed, please not to close the website, the system is submitting again

notCloseText.message: Please not to close the website

errorOccurText.message: Error occurs when system automatically uploading the answers, please check if the Internet connection is OK or contact teacher for help.

guaranteeText.message: In order to guarantee that you can take the exam smoothly, please check if there is any abnormality in the Internet!

browserText.message: Please not to close the browser as it’s now uploading your oral audio you have recorded. Recording cannot be submitted if browser is close. Please wait…

recordSaveText.message: Your other records have been saved.  But error occurs when uploading oral record, please check the exam environment and try again later

haveText.message: You still have {no} question(s) not answered, do you want to continue to submit?

systemSubmitText.message: The system is submitting answers for you

tryText.message: Submission failed, now try to help you submit again!

checkText.message: Submission failed, please check if the Internet works OK!

examTimeText.message: Exam time is up, system will submit your exam paper automatically and close the browser window!

examSearchText.message: The exam that you search does not exist!

invalidExamCount.message: You have exceeded the limit of the number of times taking the exam this time, therefore, you cannot take exam again! Number of times limited to taking exam:

photoConfirm.message: 你还没有完成人脸识别的照片认证，无法进入考试。现在去认证？
